title: jgonzi
author: jgonzi
created_time: October 05, 2022, 11:54:58 AMLast edit: January 30, 2023, 02:55:35 PM by jgonzi
content: New Autoswitcher 1.66 from lolMiner:With support for all these algos at the moment are:AEALPHBEAMBTGCTXCERGETCETC+ALPHETC+KASETHFETHF+ALPHETHF+KASETHWETHW+ALPHETHW+KASFLUXGRINKASMWCNEXANH-AutolykosNH-BeamNH-EtchashNH-Etchash+ALPHNH-Etchash+KASNH-EthashNH-Ethash+ALPHNH-Ethash+KASNH-ZelHashIt has feautre: - Auto OC Overclocking- Check every 60minutes best mining coin or ZIL WindowsReally easy to fill: ALGO,pool,user,hashrateDUALALGO,pool,user,dualpool,dualuser,hashrate,dualhashrateWith Watts and Price electricity :ALGO,pool,user,hashrate/watts/pricekwDUALALGO,pool,user,dualpool,dualuser,hashrate/watts/pricekw,dualhashrateANY ALGO + ZILFull Guide at: https://github.com/Lolliedieb/lolMiner-releases/wiki/Guide----lolMiner-AutoSwitch-(HiveOS---Beta)Best combination: - Full Nicehash + Dual Mining- PPS+ Pools - Best Dual Mining combinationChangelog: 1.66 Added ANY ALGO+ZIL1.65a Added Watts and Price electricity cost1.59a: Added Auto OC Overclocking with APIKEY and added all ETHF combinations.

comments.body: How To Generate a Hive OS API Key | Retro Mike Mining ToolsIn this quick video, I go over how to create a Hive OS API Key that can be used for connecting external applications to your Hive OS Farm, such as Retro Mike Mining Toolshttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EzCmEpaErlU

comments.body: Added in 1.66 ANY ALGO + ZIL:ANY ALGO + ZIL Mining Example:We just need to add ZIL as coin like ZIL,pool,wallet,{OC} Other Guides like:KAS+ZIL: https://medium.com/@jgonzi/mining-kas-zil-adef7270c44fNEXA+ZIL: https://medium.com/@jgonzi/mining-nexa-zil-e142ee769dcbERGO+ZIL: https://medium.com/@jgonzi/mining-ergo-zil-a814c547c9adFLUX+ZIL: https://medium.com/@jgonzi/mining-flux-zil-fe41b3bcbde8
